metadata.title: CVE-2020-11729 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through 0.60. Long-term session cookies, uses to provide long-term session continuity, are not generated securely, enabling a brute-force attack that may be successful.

criterions.comment: awl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.61-1').
